citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Two goats were observed with long hooves. Long hooves can affect the health of the animal and could potentially lead to
lameness and or pain/distress. The licensee must ensure that the goats receive regular hoof trimming in order to prevent
overgrown hooves. The hooves were trimmed at the conclusion of the APHIS inspection.
**********Corrected on August 25, 2025

Records are not being maintained to reflect the births and total numbers of fallow deer at the facility. Records must be
maintained reflecting the information required per this section, including any offspring born at the facility. The licensee
must develop and maintain records concerning all regulated animals owned or held at the facility.
********Correct by September 8, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Two goats were observed with long hooves. Long hooves can affect the health of the animal and could potentially lead to 
lameness and or pain/distress. The licensee must ensure that the goats receive regular hoof trimming in order to prevent 
overgrown hooves. The hooves were trimmed at the conclusion of the APHIS inspection.  
**********Corrected on August 25, 2025 
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
Records are not being maintained to reflect the births and total numbers of fallow deer at the facility. Records must be 
maintained reflecting the information required per this section, including any offspring born at the facility. The licensee 
must develop and maintain records concerning all regulated animals owned or held at the facility.  
********Correct by September 8, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
